attributes.action: UK to boycott Saudi Arabia on Hyman Rights Violations
attributes.additional_details: The UK has major dealings with Saudi Arabia, selling arms, trading in oil and many other merchandise, yet it is a country which beheads homosexuals, religious minorities and people who commit trivial crimes with little chance of repreve however we turn a blind eye these major injustices for profiteering and reward with no consideration of those who suffer under the regime. The UK should cease to trade with Saudi Arabia until which time they respect the rights and lives if all people regardless of their nationality or religious beliefs.
